Top-3 Scripts:
so_57598316: DatePlus1Hour="$(date --utc --iso=ns --date="now 1 hour")"

/usr/bin/date --set=$DatePlus1Hour

sudo /usr/bin/date --utc --set="$DatePlus1Hour"

sudo date --set="now +1 hour"

so_43697746: date -d

while read -r line; do 
    echo $(date -d "$line" +%Y-%m-%d); 
done < file.txt

Explanations about Options.-d: display time described by STRING, not 'now'
